ratings.question_text: The readings/cases/textbooks used in this course were __________ .
Out-of-class assignments for this course were ___________ to my learning.
The workload for this course in comparison to other courses was ___________.
The pace of this class was ____________ for optimal learning.
Field trips were well designed and ran smoothly.
I learned a lot from field trips.
How clearly does the instructor provide explanations of conceptual material?
How responsive to student comments was the instructor?
I would give the instructor of this class an overall rating of:
I would give this course an overall rating of:
Apart from how well the course was taught, how valuable is the course to students with interests similar to yours?
Did you participate in a work group as part of this course?

narratives.question_text: Use the space below to comment on questions 1-14, if you wish
comments: This class is done so well. Maureen and David do an incredible job of providing feedback on what you'redoing throughout the course.

narratives.question_text: What were the best aspects of this course?
comments: I think the PowerPoints, sample business plans, and many of the exercises were incredibly helpful. The one-on-one sessions with the professors were also extremely useful.
The amount of feedback I received, how responsive both Maureen and David were to questions, and the ability to work on an applied project.

narratives.question_text: What aspects of this course need the most improvement?
comments: I wish sometimes that we didn't skip around so much on the writing of the business plan. Sometimes I felt like if we had been able to continue to build off of what we were doing instead of writing the executive summary after attempting the other pieces but not getting them fully in good shape, the executive summary would have been better.

narratives.question_text: Was the relationship between the course lectures and discussion/lab section
Discuss, if you wish, how this course fits into your overall program.  (Please feel free to describe how the course relates to your academic background.)
comments: I didn't realize it would when I took it. Now it exposed me to a job route that I never would have considered before and I'm so thankful for that.

narratives.question_text: Why did you take this course?
comments: To work on the specific project I had created with my team.

narratives.question_text: Did the knowledge/skills that you gained from the course meet your expectations ?
If yes, what were the advantages and disadvantages of the group work?
comments: We definitely had to figure out what are strengths and weaknesses were at different points andsometimes our weaknesses got the better of us.

narratives.question_text: For students who might consider taking this course, what advice would you give them?
comments: Try your best to find a group and an idea that you're really passionate about, if you can't find such a group but can get into another group then focus on imbibing the concepts and using the skills. Also learn how to work on whatever kind of team you have.
Find a way to take this course. It's the best course I've taken.
